title: Impact of E-Learning on the Education Industry and Analysis of Learning Experiences

context.additional_context: Online real-time classes conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, reflecting learners' practical experiences through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three positive and negative impacts occurring in e-learning environments.
Learners can systematically reflect on their online learning experiences by applying the Interpretative Phenomenological Analysis (IPA) methodology.
Learners can write a project report (5 pages) on factors facilitating and hindering the diffusion of e-learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
